summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of the alley in block 39, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, from East Aloha Street to East Prospect Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 87545 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
